chapter.title: Resolved Issues
chapter.para: To view information about issues resolved in this release of JBoss Developer Studio, see on the JBoss issue tracking system and enter the following search query as one line: (project in (JBIDE) AND affectedVersion in ("4.0.0.Final", "4.0.1.Final") AND fixVersion >= "4.1.0.Alpha1" OR project = JBDS AND fixversion in ("6.0.0.GA", "6.0.1.GA") AND fixVersion >= "7.0.0.Alpha1") AND type in (Bug) AND resolution in (Done)
